channel.title: [742] Powersurge V2 BEST SERVER EVER NEW, 24/7, FORUMS, NEEDSTAFF!
channel.description:
Ok so any of you guys remember my 667 well I have successfully converted it to a 718. Credits to King J Scape for his release that I heavily edited.
[SIZE=6]Server Stage:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i1094.photobucket.com/albums/i452/rentedo999/Online_zps6d633ccf.png[/img]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1094.photobucket.com/albums/i452/rentedo999/PowersurgeAdvertt_zps3b05456d.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
List of things yet to do.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= -Fix dungeoneering -Re-do dicing. -Fix squeal of fortune. -Re-do Donator zone. -Give donator's private bosses. -Integrate server to forums. -Fairy Ring -Make livid farm 100% =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
List of things fixed/ done. =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= -Matrix dialogue bug. -Fix safe pk. -Convert 90% of the files. -Re-do item bonuses. -Make upgraded weapons. -Fix money pouch so it is 99% (No Sound's) -Fix the matrix hack. -Add Artians workshop (not fully working yet) -Re-did background (Please post your opinions). -Perfect switching. -Added Upgraded dragon claws and Upgraded Armadyl Godsword. -Uploaded and run the server on VPS. -Repacked cache and made more stable. -Added the new better looking Nex armor's. -Added Ganodermic Beasts. -Added King Black Dragon. -Added Castle Wars reward shop. -Added 80% Hunter. -Added 99% Money Pouch. -Re-did Nomad -Re-did Crucible -Added Glacors with Weakness. -Added all donator ranks. -Made Custom Pk Token interface -Added Lobby and multiple Worlds -Added custom teleports -Added Lootshare
Server Feature's =============== -Lobby -Bork -Corp -Tormented Demons -Dung Base -Completionist & Max cape Customizing -Dominion Tower -Castle Wars -Godwars -Fight Kiln -Fight Caves -Curse's and all Magik's -Proper Chaotic's -Upgraded Weapons -Upgraded Armor -Puro Puro -Money Pouch -Easy to start
This server got very popular and had over 30 active players.
[UPDATE]Bought VPS & Ddos Protected Website [/UPDATE] MORE PICTURES COMING SOON.

item.title: [742] Powersurge V2 BEST SERVER EVER NEW, 24/7, FORUMS, NEEDSTAFF!
item.dc:creator: @rentedo999 rentedo999
item.description:
@rentedo999 wrote:

Ok so any of you guys remember my 667 well I have successfully converted it to a 718. Credits to King J Scape for his release that I heavily edited.

[SIZE=6]Server Stage:[/SIZE]

[CENTER][/CENTER]

List of things yet to do.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
-Fix dungeoneering
-Re-do dicing.
-Fix squeal of fortune.
-Re-do Donator zone.
-Give donator’s private bosses.
-Integrate server to forums.
-Fairy Ring
-Make livid farm 100%
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

List of things fixed/ done.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
-Matrix dialogue bug.
-Fix safe pk.
-Convert 90% of the files.
-Re-do item bonuses.
-Make upgraded weapons.
-Fix money pouch so it is 99% (No Sound’s)
-Fix the matrix hack.
-Add Artians workshop (not fully working yet)
-Re-did background (Please post your opinions).
-Perfect switching.
-Added Upgraded dragon claws and Upgraded Armadyl Godsword.
-Uploaded and run the server on VPS.
-Repacked cache and made more stable.
-Added the new better looking Nex armor’s.
-Added Ganodermic Beasts.
-Added King Black Dragon.
-Added Castle Wars reward shop.
-Added 80% Hunter.
-Added 99% Money Pouch.
-Re-did Nomad
-Re-did Crucible
-Added Glacors with Weakness.
-Added all donator ranks.
-Made Custom Pk Token interface
-Added Lobby and multiple Worlds
-Added custom teleports
-Added Lootshare

Server Feature’s

-Lobby
-Bork
-Corp
-Tormented Demons
-Dung Base
-Completionist & Max cape Customizing
-Dominion Tower
-Castle Wars
-Godwars
-Fight Kiln
-Fight Caves
-Curse’s and all Magik’s
-Proper Chaotic’s
-Upgraded Weapons
-Upgraded Armor
-Puro Puro
-Money Pouch
-Easy to start

This server got very popular and had over 30 active players.

[UPDATE]Bought VPS & Ddos Protected Website [/UPDATE]
MORE PICTURES COMING SOON.

[CENTER][SIZE=5]Media[/SIZE]
Powersurge Client Background

Ganodermic Beasts

Dicing

Proper Dominion Tower

Dominion Tower Spectating

Fightcaves

Lobby with multiple


Pegasus Teleports

View Stats

PvP Armor’s and weapon degrading

Multi FFA

Godwars



Glacors

Command to turn on or off roundhouse woodcutting.

Custom PvP Shop/ Interface




Interface for buying titles that require kills

Upgraded Dragon Claws


[/CENTER]
